bundles.name: CI/CD Pipeline Template
bundles.description: Expert agent for designing and implementing CI/CD pipelines across multiple platforms
bundles.longDescription: Transform your Kiro into a CI/CD expert! This agent bundle provides comprehensive guidance for building robust continuous integration and deployment pipelines. Includes best practices for GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, and CircleCI. Perfect for DevOps engineers and developers looking to automate their software delivery process with industry-standard patterns.

external: CI/CD platform (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, etc.)

examples.title: GitHub Actions Workflow
examples.description: Create a complete CI/CD workflow with testing, building, and deployment
examples.prompt: Help me create a GitHub Actions workflow that runs tests, builds a Docker image, and deploys to AWS ECS

examples.title: Multi-Stage Pipeline
examples.description: Design a pipeline with development, staging, and production stages
examples.prompt: Design a multi-stage CI/CD pipeline with automated testing in dev, manual approval for staging, and blue-green deployment to production

examples.title: Pipeline Optimization
examples.description: Optimize existing pipeline for speed and reliability
examples.prompt: Review my current CI/CD pipeline and suggest optimizations for faster builds and better caching strategies

bundles.name: Kubernetes Monitor
bundles.description: Expert agent for monitoring, debugging, and managing Kubernetes clusters
bundles.longDescription: Transform your Kiro into a Kubernetes expert! This agent bundle provides comprehensive guidance for monitoring, troubleshooting, and managing Kubernetes clusters. Includes best practices for observability, resource management, deployment validation, and incident response. Perfect for DevOps engineers and SREs managing containerized applications at scale.

examples.title: Debug Pod Issues

examples.title: Set Up Monitoring
examples.description: Configure comprehensive monitoring for your cluster
examples.prompt: Help me set up Prometheus and Grafana for monitoring my Kubernetes cluster with key metrics and alerts

examples.title: Optimize Resource Usage
examples.description: Analyze and optimize resource requests and limits
examples.prompt: Review my deployment manifests and suggest optimal resource requests and limits based on actual usage

examples.title: Validate Deployment
examples.prompt: Validate this Kubernetes deployment manifest and check for common issues and best practices

bundles.name: Terraform Helper
bundles.description: Expert agent for writing, testing, and managing infrastructure as code with Terraform

Includes best practices for module design, state management, testing strategies, and multi-cloud deployments. Perfect for DevOps engineers and infrastructure teams building scalable, maintainable infrastructure.

examples.title: Refactor to Modules
